item.title: Several papers from the lab accepted by ACL 2024
item.description: In July 2024, 2 papers from the academic group were accepted at the ACL 2024 conference. ACL is the Association for Computational Linguistics, which is the most influential academic organisation in the field of computational linguistics, and is the most important international conference in the field of computational linguistics, and is the only Class A conference in computational linguistics recommended by CCF. The brief description of the accepted papers is given below:
